description:
Thrown together by fate, Uryu and Yoshino find themselves strange allies in a desperate fight against Koga and his feminine killing machine, Dalc.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Earth-Shattering Event at 11th Squad! The Shinigami who Rises Again
Evènement bouleversant pour la 11ème Division ! Le Shinigami qui sort de l`oubli !
Juuichi Ban Tai Gekishin! Yomigaetta Shinigami
十一番隊激震! よみがえった死神
